ack.title: Acknowledgments:
ack.p: We thank Changwen Ke, De Wu, and Jiufeng Sun from the Guangdong Center for Disease Control and Prevention for providing with 25 DENV strains and their epidemiological data. This study was partly supported by the National Key R&D Program of China (grant no. 2018YFC1602206), the National Natural Science Foundation of China (nos. 31470271 and 81730110), and Guangzhou and Guangdong Science and Technology Program key projects (grant nos. 201803040006 and 2018B020207006).
